<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Weapon Improviser Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2099) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 199 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Weapon Improviser](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=82)

**Prerequisites**
trained in all martial weapons

</column>

---

You don't take the normal –2 penalty to attack rolls with [improvised weapons](/Rules.aspx?ID=224). Additionally, whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with any weapon, you also gain that proficiency with improvised weapons.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the weapon improviser archetype.

<title level="2">Weapon Improviser Dedication leads to...</title>
[Improvised Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=2102), [Improvised Pummel](/Feats.aspx?ID=2100), [Makeshift Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2103), [Surprise Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2101)
name: Weapon Improviser Dedication
